Korean People's Struggle Supported
articles.content:
Korean People's Struggle Supported 
    Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- The government and people of Guinea are extending full support and solidarity to the Korean people in all their efforts to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification, progress and prosperity of the country, said Lansana Conte, president of Guinea, when receiving the credentials from Kim Pong Hui, new DPRK ambassador to Guinea, on July 22.
 He expressed satisfaction with the successfully developing friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries.

Greetings to Moroccan King
articles.content:
Greetings to Moroccan King
    Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Moroccan King Mohamed the sixth today on the occasion of the national day of Morocco.
 The message sincerely wished him good health and happiness and the people of Morocco greater progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Choe Thae Bok Meets Indian Ambassador
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok Meets Indian Ambassador
    Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with new Indian Ambassador N. T. Khankhup who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.

articles.title: Paek Nam Sun Meets U.N. Resident Coordinator
articles.content:
Paek Nam Sun Meets U.N. Resident Coordinator
    Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun met and conversed with Masood Hyder, U.N. resident coordinator to the DPRK who paid a farewell call on him today.
